alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Colquitt; Cook; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 4:19PM EDT until July 09 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cook County in south central Georgia... Berrien County in south central Georgia... Lanier County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 419 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Omega to Adel to near Valdosta, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Lakeland, Valdosta, Adel, Sparks, Omega, Ray City, Lenox, Moody Air Force Base, Meigs, Barretts, New Lois, Massee, Wagon Wheel, Hansell, Allenville, Weber, Teeterville, Naylor and Courthouse. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
